## Notes from Readings

[Random Survival Forests](https://arxiv.org/pdf/0811.1645.pdf)

- Random Survival Models provide a different estimation technique for evaluating time-to-event data based upon CART and Poisson tree likelihood. 
- Use of the C-index as a performance estimator
